name: Anthropic Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Anthropic Tool 节点。主要用于: Interact with Anthropic AI models

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Interact with Anthropic AI models | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: text
available_options: Document (值: document)
File (值: file)
Image (值: image)
Prompt (值: prompt)
Text (值: text)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: message
available_options: Message a Model (值: message) - Create a completion with Anthropic model
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

modelId.name: modelId
modelId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Model | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

text.name: text
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text Input | 默认值: What's in this image?

inputType.name: inputType
inputType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Type | 默认值: url
available_options: Image URL(s) (值: url)
Binary File(s) (值: binary)

documentUrls.name: documentUrls
documentUrls.description: URL(s) of the document(s) to analyze, multiple URLs can be added separated by comma
documentUrls.natural_language_description: 参数名: URL(s) | 作用: URL(s) of the document(s) to analyze, multiple URLs can be added separated by comma

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.description: Name of the binary field(s) which contains the file(s) to attach, multiple field names can be added separated by comma
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Attachment Input Data Field Name(s) | 作用: Name of the binary field(s) which contains the file(s) to attach, multiple field names can be added separated by comma | 默认值: data

simplify.name: simplify
simplify.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simplify.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify Output | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: includeMergedResponse (值: None) - Whether to include a single output string merging all text parts of the response
system (值: None)
codeExecution (值: None) - Whether to enable code execution. Not supported by all models.
webSearch (值: None) - Whether to enable web search
maxUses (值: None) - The maximum number of web search uses per request
allowedDomains (值: None) - Comma-separated list of domains to search. Only domains in this list will be searched. Conflicts with "Web Search Blocked Domains".
blockedDomains (值: None) - Comma-separated list of domains to block from search. Conflicts with "Web Search Allowed Domains".
maxTokens (值: None) - The maximum number of tokens to generate in the completion
temperature (值: None) - Controls the randomness of the output. Lowering results in less random completions. As the temperature approaches zero, the model will become deterministic and repetitive
topP (值: None) - The maximum cumulative probability of tokens to consider when sampling
topK (值: None) - The maximum number of tokens to consider when sampling
maxToolsIterations (值: None) - The maximum number of tool iteration cycles the LLM will run before stopping. A single iteration can contain multiple tool calls. Set to 0 for no limit

fileId.name: fileId
fileId.description: ID of the file to get metadata for
fileId.natural_language_description: 参数名: File ID | 作用: ID of the file to get metadata for

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

fileUrl.name: fileUrl
fileUrl.description: URL of the file to upload
fileUrl.natural_language_description: 参数名: URL | 作用: URL of the file to upload

imageUrls.name: imageUrls
imageUrls.description: URL(s) of the image(s) to analyze, multiple URLs can be added separated by comma
imageUrls.natural_language_description: 参数名: URL(s) | 作用: URL(s) of the image(s) to analyze, multiple URLs can be added separated by comma

experimentalNotice.displayName: The prompt tools APIs are in a closed research preview. Your organization must request access to use them.
experimentalNotice.name: experimentalNotice
experimentalNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: The prompt tools APIs are in a closed research preview. Your organization must request access to use them.

task.name: task
task.natural_language_description: 参数名: Task | 作用: Description of the prompt's purpose

messages.name: messages
messages.natural_language_description: 参数名: Messages | 默认值: {'values': [{'content': '', 'role': 'user'}]}
available_options: values (值: None)

addAttachments.name: addAttachments
addAttachments.description: Whether to add attachments to the message
addAttachments.natural_language_description: 参数名: Add Attachments | 作用: Whether to add attachments to the message | 默认值: False

attachmentsInputType.name: attachmentsInputType
attachmentsInputType.description: The type of input to use for the attachments
attachmentsInputType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Attachments Input Type | 作用: The type of input to use for the attachments | 默认值: url
available_options: URL(s) (值: url)
Binary File(s) (值: binary)

attachmentsUrls.name: attachmentsUrls
attachmentsUrls.description: URL(s) of the file(s) to attach, multiple URLs can be added separated by comma
attachmentsUrls.natural_language_description: 参数名: Attachment URL(s) | 作用: URL(s) of the file(s) to attach, multiple URLs can be added separated by comma

output_contract.standardizer_logic: return { payload: { primary: upstream.content || upstream.text || upstream } }
